title: Authors and Citation
text: Parry J (2025). ipapi: 'IPQuery' API Client. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://josiahparry.github.io/ipapi-r/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ipapi: An 'IPQuery' API Client},   author = {Josiah Parry},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://josiahparry.github.io/ipapi-r/}, }

title: An IPQuery API Client
text: R package query IP addresses using ipquery.io API.

title: An IPQuery API Client
text: query_ips() function retrieves information IP addresses, including ISP, location, risk data.
code: query_ips(c("8.8.8.8", "1.1.1.1")) # A data frame: 2 × 19   ip      asn    org    isp    country country_code city  state zipcode latitude * <chr>   <list> <list> <list> <chr>   <chr>        <chr> <chr> <chr>      <dbl> 1 8.8.8.8 <chr>  <chr>  <chr>  United… US           Moun… Cali… 94043       37.4 2 1.1.1.1 <chr>  <chr>  <chr>  Austra… AU           Sydn… New … 1001       -33.9 # ℹ 9 more variables: longitude <dbl>, timezone <chr>, localtime <chr>, #   is_mobile <list>, is_vpn <list>, is_tor <list>, is_proxy <list>, #   is_datacenter <list>, risk_score <list>

what: Fetch Your Own Public IP Address
title: An IPQuery API Client
text: query_own_ip() function retrieves public IP address current machine.
code: query_own_ip() ip asn org isp country country_code city state zipcode  latitude 1 203.0.113.45 AS0                                                 0.0142516      longitude timezone           localtime is_mobile is_vpn is_tor is_proxy 1 -0.008837991          2025-01-02T16:06:08     FALSE  FALSE  FALSE    FALSE   is_datacenter risk_score 1         FALSE          0

what: Get information about IP Addresses — query_ips
title: Get information about IP Addresses — query_ips
text: Return detailed information vector IP addresses.

title: Get information about IP Addresses — query_ips
Get information about IP Addresses — query_ips
text: ips character vector IP addresses. Must contain NA values.

title: Get information about IP Addresses — query_ips
text: data.frame columns ip: character isp: character asn: character org: character country: character country_code: character city: character state: character zipcode: character latitude: numeric longitude: numeric timezone: character localtime: character is_mobile: logical is_vpn: logical is_tor: logical is_proxy: logical is_datacenter: logical risk_score: integer

title: Get information about IP Addresses — query_ips
Get information about IP Addresses — query_ips
code: # Only run this example when internet is present if (rlang::is_installed("curl")) {   if (curl::has_internet()) {     query_ips("1.1.1.1")   } } #>        ip     asn              org              isp   country country_code #> 1 1.1.1.1 AS13335 Cloudflare, Inc. Cloudflare, Inc. Australia           AU #>     city           state zipcode  latitude longitude         timezone #> 1 Sydney New South Wales    1001 -33.85455  151.2002 Australia/Sydney #>             localtime is_mobile is_vpn is_tor is_proxy is_datacenter risk_score #> 1 2025-01-02T16:09:55     FALSE  FALSE  FALSE    FALSE          TRUE          0

title: Query host IP Address — query_own_ip
text: Returns information IP address host machine.
